description: Home warranty and receipt tracker with expiration alerts. Scan receipts, auto-extract warranty dates, store product manuals, and get reminded before coverage expires.
target_user: Homeowners and renters with valuable appliances, electronics, and furniture who want to protect their purchases
core_loop: Scan receipt or manually add purchase
Auto-extract warranty period and product details
Store digital copy of receipt and manual
Receive alert 30 days before warranty expires
